snippet: The Del Mar racetrack in Southern California suspended racing on its new turf course through this weekend after a thoroughbred was badly injured and eight other horses died in the last two weeks, officials said.
abstract: Del Mar racetrack in Southern California suspends racing on its new turf course following injury of one thoroughbred and death of eight other horses within two weeks.
lead_paragraph: The Del Mar racetrack in Southern California suspended racing on its new turf course through this weekend after a thoroughbred was badly injured and eight other horses died in the last two weeks, officials said.

headline.main: Worries Over Surface at Del Mar Track
